name: opencv412
summary: A prebuilt OpenCV 4.12.0 XCFramework for iOS, supporting image processing on arm64 devices and simulators.
description:
OpenCV (Open Source Computer Vision Library) is an open source computer vision and machine learning software library.
This pod provides a lightweight version of OpenCV 4.12.0 specifically optimized for image recognition tasks on iOS and macOS platforms, with unnecessary modules removed to reduce binary size.
